given flag.txt
```

```

looks like this is base64 encrypted
```bash
❯ echo "" | base64 -d
%
```

seems like it base64 inside base64
```bash
❯ echo "Vm0wd2VFMUhSWGROVldSWVYwZG9XVmxyWkZOWFJsbDNXa1pPVmxac2
" | base64 -d
%
```

and its nested
lets write some code to solve
```python
import base64

text = b""

while True:
    if b"NETSOS" in text: break
    text = base64.b64decode(text)

print(text)
```

```
❯ python3 solve.py                                         ─╯
b'NETSOS{HI_THIS_IS_ME_BEFORE_BEING_ENCODED}'
```
